stories.original_headline: The 98% mystery: Scientists just cracked the code on “junk DNA” linked to Alzheimer’s
stories.original_summary: Researchers have revealed that so-called “junk DNA” contains powerful switches that help control brain cells linked to Alzheimer’s disease. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Hidden Runes in Life's Tapestry, Linked to Fading Minds.
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Guild of Alchemists has unveiled a profound secret within the body's hidden scripts, finding powerful activation sigils that control the mind-gems. These runes, once deemed meaningless, now show a connection to the fading mind blight. Their discovery brings new hope for understanding this mysterious ailment.

stories.fantasy_headline: Rivian Clan Forges Own Spirit-Guided Chariots, Not Just Chasing Tesla.
stories.fantasy_story: The Rivian Clan of Artisans, known for their rugged enchanted carriages, now seeks to forge their own mind-driven wagons. Their chieftain, RJ Scaringe, explained this grand undertaking at their Palo Alto workshop. This bold move aims for true magical innovation, not merely to rival the Tesla Guild's swift conveyances.

stories.fantasy_headline: Nex's Enchanted Play-Cube Sells Out, Delighting Young Lords and Ladies.
stories.fantasy_story: The realm is abuzz with tales of Nex's Enchanted Play-Cube, a sold-out artifact that brings great joy to young lords and ladies. This small mimicry-cube, no larger than a fist, uses a magic scrying orb to mirror a player's movements. Its popularity even outshone Mastersoft's grand X-Box contraption for a time.
